description: The initiative focuses on the development and implementation of aquaponics systems, which integrate fish farming and plant cultivation in a sustainable, closed-loop environment. Located in a rural area, the founders initially aimed to sell fresh produce, such as aromatic herbs and lettuce, but pivoted to designing and constructing aquaponics systems tailored to various clients, including restaurants and community centers. Their approach emphasizes sustainability, utilizing solar energy and waste recycling, while also incorporating innovative technology like the Internet of Things to enhance system management. The initiative not only addresses food production but also aims to create social impact by providing educational opportunities and resources for local communities, thereby fostering self-sufficiency and environmental stewardship.
name: AFO Acuaponia
